mapper.select: SELECT uid, board_uid, member_uid, hits, title, content, created_date FROM Article WHERE uid = #{article_uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE Article SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE uid = #{article_uid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.uid, m.nickname, a.title, a.content, a.hits, a.created_date FROM Article as a JOIN Member as m ON m.uid = a.member_uid WHERE a.uid = #{article_uid}

mapper.update: UPDATE Article SET hits = hits + 1 WHERE uid = #{article_uid}
